thread.title: Toyota Recalls 6.5 Million Vehicles For Window Switch Defect
thread.title_full: Toyota Recalls 6.5 Million Vehicles For Window Switch Defect

title: Toyota Recalls 6.5 Million Vehicles For Window Switch Defect
text:
Toyota Recalls 6.5 Million Vehicles For Window Switch Defect October 21, 2015, 10:35 AM TOKYO - 
Toyota Motor Corp. is recalling 6.5 million vehicles worldwide for a defective power window switch that can overheat, melt and lead to fires. One injury in the U.S., a person who suffered a burn on the hand, has been reported related to the defect. The Japanese automaker said in an email Wednesday that the recall includes 2.7 million vehicles in North America, 1.2 million in Europe and 600,000 in Japan. It involves the Yaris, Corolla, Matrix, Camry, RAV4, Highlander, Tundra and other models. Toyota said the defect was caused by grease which was sprayed on improperly during the manufacturing of electrical contact modules. Â© 2015 Associated Press. All rights reserved.
